bean.description: This bean is used to send emails. It must implement interface org.esupportail.commons.services.smtp.SmtpService.

property.name: fromAddress
property.description: The 'from' address to use when sending emails.

property.name: interceptAddress
property.description: The address to which _all_ the emails should be sent. This tag is particularly useful when setting up the application to prevent from spam effects. When no tag is used, then all the emails are normally sent to their recipients.

property.name: testAddress
property.description: The address to which test emails (sent by ant target tets-smtp) will be sent.

bean.description: This beans describes a SMTP server.

property.name: host
property.description: The host name or IP number of the server, defaults to localhost.

property.name: port
property.description: The port number the SMTP server is running on (defaults to 25).

property.name: user
property.description: The SMTP user (comment or leave empty for an anonymous connection).

property.name: password
property.description: The SMTP password (ignored for an anonymous connection).
